features: Mini Handheld Garment Iron: Our travel mini iron can both hang and flat iron, and has both dry ironing and wet ironing modes, iron for clothes can be applied to various fabrics and meet your different ironing needs. Please note: Since we need to test each iron with water, there will be a small number of water stains remaining, which is normal.

Pointed Curved Design: Sharp corner designed electric iron handheld garment iron can easily move smoothly on all types of clothes, 360 degree ironing without dead corners, portable iron for clothes can flexibly iron narrow areas such as buttons, plackets, and collars, and elegantly show details, meet your different ironing needs, finish ironing easily.

Practical and Portable Iron: Travel iron for clothes portable mini features a rounded design and hidden water tank which make travel iron mini beautiful, compact and practical. The Portable steam iron for clothes uses a large titanium panel, which can be used for a lasting time and no damage to clothes. The handle folds 180 degree convenient to use, the travel size iron for clothes is a good choice for home or travel and business.

Portable Iron for Home Travel: The travel iron mini can be used to clothes, shirts, curtains, bed sheets, plush, cotton, linen, and other fabrics. The mini ironing machine is lightweight, portable, very suitable for home and travel, handheld iron can be easily put into suitcases and backpacks, easy to carry out.

Safe To Use: Our mini iron for clothes travel size are double protected with smart temperature control and fuses so you can use micro iron with peace of mind. Simple one-touch start design makes operation more convenient. If you have any problems in use, please contact us, we will do our best to help you.

【Note】1. Usage instructions: This mini iron operates on a low power of 38W, making it lightweight and portable. After plugging it into the power supply, allow a short period of time for preheating (a longer preheating time will result in better performance). The voltage is 110V, and with sufficient preheating time, the iron can reach a temperature of 170°C for optimal ironing.

【Note】2. Iron mode operation: To activate the iron mode, simply press the button and water will spray evenly from the center outlet onto the clothes. Gently glide the iron back and forth while spraying for effective wrinkle removal. For proper heat dissipation during storage, remember to first turn off the switch, place the iron on a heat-insulated mat, and wait for the temperature to decrease before storing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Travel iron for clothes portable mini, portable handheld clothes steamer The mini hand-held garment ironing machine is compact in design, small and light, with 180 degree ironing without dead ends, and can be used for all kinds of fabrics. It is simple and convenient to use, very suitable for family and travel use, you can enjoy ironing anytime, anywhere.

Two Ways, As Your Choose - Handheld Travel Garment Iron for Clothes Impressive flow to smooth away the wrinkles and re-fresh your garments or drapes instantly A leak-proof design means no leakage or spillage, allows ironing both vertically and horizontally, support dry and wet ironing. Folding for compact size makes small iron a great travel companion, for 110V-120V countries. Safe to use on all fabrics and suitable for clothes, curtains, furniture, toys and so much more.

Pointed Curved Design 360-degree ironing without dead corners. The front side of the hanging ironing machine panel are designed with water chestnut corners, which can flexibly iron narrow areas such as buttons, plackets and collars, allowing the details to be displayed elegantly. Come with Filling cup The travel clothes iron uses a 50 ml integrated water tank design, it is convenient to add water with the filling cup to prevent splashes, you can check the water level in the tank at any time. Family Travel Essentials The handheld mini iron is compact in design, small and light, easy to store, exquisite and stylish, very suitable for family and travel use, you can enjoy ironing anytime and anywhere.

Efficiently Removes Clothes Winkles, Keeps You Brand New Everyday Travel Mini Iron for Clothes Please check the clothing label to make sure if it can be ironed before ironing. It's recommended to use distilled water and always empty excess water from the tank in order to make sure it performs to its best capability. During ironing, please do not touch the panel with any part of your body to avoid burns, and keep the iron away from children.For some thermal sensitive fabrics, such as nylon, silk,wool, chiffon and etc, we recommend to put a smooth white wet cloth on top of the clothes to avoid morph or damage.

Portable Handheld Iron - Only use for 110V-120V Small Iron for Clothes Travel Size Handheld iron can save space, is a lightweight, compact design, and very suitable for travel and outing use. It can be easily put into suitcases and backpacks and can be easily carried anytime, anywhere. A perfect gift for friends, families, and yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Iron for clothes.
reviews.reviewText: This travel iron can iron my clothes in just a few minutes. The size is perfect, making it easy to carry in my travel bag. Whether for travel or daily use, it's incredibly practical. It's definitely a must-have item for travel! I would 100% recommend to anyone who needs a mini ironing machine for travel
